originalText.text: Excellent group of dentists that go the extra mile to make the little ones so comfortable. We have seen recently Dr. Sheryl and she was patient, loving and with a great storytelling to keep my son comfortable and calm at all times. The office staff is very nice and accommodating for emergencies. Would totally recommend!

text.text: Excellent group of dentists that go the extra mile to make the little ones so comfortable. We have seen recently Dr. Sheryl and she was patient, loving and with a great storytelling to keep my son comfortable and calm at all times. The office staff is very nice and accommodating for emergencies. Would totally recommend!

originalText.text: Had a great experience during my first dental visit here. Staff was very friendly and attentive. My insurance was out of network but i was informed every step of the way on any possible costs. Dr Emily Park was fantastic. She was very informative and considerate throughout the process. Really felt cared for. Happy to schedule my next visit here.

text.text: Had a great experience during my first dental visit here. Staff was very friendly and attentive. My insurance was out of network but i was informed every step of the way on any possible costs. Dr Emily Park was fantastic. She was very informative and considerate throughout the process. Really felt cared for. Happy to schedule my next visit here.

originalText.text: My first time at this practice, however I've been a loyal patient of Dr. Emily Park's for a decade and she recently moved here. The front desk was very responsive and available to answer questions about insurance and confirming my appointment. The facility is very clean and was happy with my experience there for my first checkup. Would highly recommend Dr. Park as she is very balanced about prescribing treatment and discussing options both for medical and financial reasons.

originalText.text: I first met Dr. Ta in 2000 when I decided to take the plunge and get braces at age 32. I had been told the process would be quite difficult by other dentists/orthodontists, and might include having my jaw broken so I had always been hesitant. Dr. Ta evaluated me and reassured me that she could help me, that she had a plan that would work without breaking my jaw. I still count meeting her as one of my luckiest and most life-changing moments. She is an absolute genius! It took 2 years and I could not have been happier with my new smile! She gave me a new outlook on life! Since then I have seen her as needed to check in regarding my retainers, etc and she and her staff have always been kind, welcoming and helpful. I just saw her today after probably 4 years for an adjustment on my permanent retainer and it was an extremely efficient yet warm and welcoming visit, like seeing an old friend. I would highly recommend Dr. Ta to anyone! She is the absolute best highly-knowledgeable and skilled orthodontist! A visit with her can be life-changing!

originalText.text: Dr. Emily Park now practices dentistry as this lovely UES zen space. Dr. Emily Park is the best dentist I have ever had in 60 years of life. She is competent, educated, SO kind, warm and genuine. If you need an exceptional dentist I suggest you run to her!
